In the dim light of a child's room, beneath the bed lay a hidden kingdom, a realm of dust bunnies and forgotten toys. Every night, when the world outside grew quiet, the inhabitants would emerge: brave knights fashioned from Lego bricks, wise queens draped in silky ribbons, and mischievous fairies made of glitter. They held grand councils to decide how to defend their realm from the looming threat of the vacuum cleaner. One night, a young girl, curious and adventurous, discovered their secret. Instead of fearing them, she joined their ranks, forging a bond that would keep the kingdom alive, even in daylight.
